thread.title: Matt Le Nevez and Brendan Cowell attend Bathurst 1000 to get a feel for Peter Brock and Allan Moffatt
thread.title_full: Matt Le Nevez and Brendan Cowell attend Bathurst 1000 to get a feel for Peter Brock and Allan Moffatt | DailyTelegraph

author: Jonathon Moran
title: Matt Le Nevez and Brendan Cowell attend Bathurst 1000 to get a feel for Peter Brock and Allan Moffatt
text:
WHAT better way for Matt Le Nevez to get in the headspace of playing late great motor racing champ Peter Brock than to spend a weekend at Bathurst?
Le Nevez and fellow actor Brendan Cowell, who will play Allan Moffatt, did just that last weekend ahead of starting filming of Ten’s much anticipated telemovie, Brock.
“The opportunity for me to go up there the week before we start rehearsals was just inspiring,” Le Nevez, 36, told Confidential.
Drivers Peter Brock and Allan Moffat with 1986 V8 Holden Commodore car.
Ella Scott Lynch will take on the role of Bev, Peter Brock’s ex-wife.
Natalie Bassingthwaighte will play the role of girlfriend Julie Bamford. Picture: Supplied
Brock's partner Julie Bamford and former partner Bev Brock escorted by Clergy behind the casket.
Allan Moffatt and Peter Brock in 1986.
